MacroOp.Name: OMNI_LITE
MacroOp.Brief: Enables certain flags that trim portions of code.
MacroOp.Considerations: It is advised to read the documentation on the individual flags enabled so as to understand what the implications are if OMNI_LITE is defined.
MacroOp.Description:
Defining the OMNI_LITE preprocessor flag will define the following flags:
@code OMNI_NO_OBJECT_NAME OMNI_NO_DISPOSE_EVENT OMNI_NO_MUTEX_OWNER OMNI_NO_TYPE_INFO OMNI_NO_SAFE_APPLICATION OMNI_NO_SAFE_DELEGATES OMNI_NO_SAFE_EVENTS OMNI_NO_SAFE_PROP OMNI_NO_SAFE_SEMAPHORE OMNI_NO_SAFE_CONDITIONAL OMNI_NO_SAFE_TIMER OMNI_NO_SAFE_THREAD OMNI_NO_SAFE_RUNNABLE_THREAD OMNI_NO_SAFE_LIBRARY OMNI_NO_FW_VER OMNI_NO_SAFE_BASIC_THREAD OMNI_NO_SAFE_MUTEX OMNI_NO_THROW OMNI_THREAD_ARGS_RAW_PTR @code
MacroOp.Synopsis: Signifies to the library to be 'slimmer' (object size/code use) by reducing certain functionality.
